required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of the Commercial Scale SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine Against the Pilot Scale Among Adults, and Bridging Study of the Immunogenicity in Elderly Against That in Adults
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blinded Clinical Trial, to Evaluate the Non-inferiority of the Commercial Scale Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine Against That of the Pilot Scale Among Adults Aged 26-45 Years, and the Open-labelled, Bridging Non-inferiority of the Vaccine Induced Immunogenicity in Elderly Against That in Adults

lead_sponsor.agency: Sinovac Research and Development Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blinded clinical Trial, to evaluate the non-inferiority of the commercial scale Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine against that of the pilot scale among adults aged 26-45 years, and the open-labelled, bridging non-inferiority of the vaccine induced immunogenicity in elderly against that in adults.

detailed_description.textblock:
This study is a randomized, double-blinded clinical Trial, to evaluate the non-inferiority of the commercial scale Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine against that of the pilot scale among adults aged 26-45 years, and the open-labelled, bridging non-inferiority of the vaccine induced immunogenicity in elderly against that in adults. The experimental vaccine was manufactured by Sinovac Research & Development Co.,Ltd. Totally 1040 subjects，including: 130 subjects aged 18~25 years; 520 subjects aged 26~45 years, with 260 in each group; 130 subjects aged 46~59 years; 260 subjects aged ≥60 years.
Subjects will be assigned to receive two doses of medium-dosage vaccine on the schedule of 0,14.

study_design_info.masking_description: The first part of the study is a double-blinded trial, the second part is a open-label research.

primary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity index-geometric mean titer(GMT) of neutralizing antibody
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 after the full course vaccination
primary_outcome.description: Neutralizing antibody assay will be performed using the micro-neutralization method

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity index-Seroconversion rate of the neutralizing antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 after the full course vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Neutralizing antibody assay will be performed using the micro-neutralization method. Seroconversion will be defined as a change from seronegative(<1:8) to seropositive(≥1:8), or ≥4 fold increase from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity index-Seropositive rate of the neutralizing antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 after the full course vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Neutralizing antibody assay will be performed using the micro-neutralization method. Subjects with a antibody titer ≥1:8 will defined as seropositive

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the beginning of the vaccination to 28 days after the full course vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse reactions from the beginning of the vaccination to 28 days after the full course vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety index-Incidence of serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the beginning of the vaccination to 6 months after the full course vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: SAE will be collected throughout the clinical trial

arm_group.description: Commercial scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine in adults aged 26-45 years.
Pilot scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine in adults aged 18-59 years.
Pilot scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine in elderly aged above 60 years.

intervention.intervention_name: Two doses of commercial scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine at the schedule of day 0,14
intervention.description: The antigen content of the commercial scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine was 600SU/0.5ml, vaccinated in the age group 26-45.

intervention.intervention_name: Two doses of pilot scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine at the schedule of day 0,14
intervention.description: The antigen content of the pilot scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine was 600SU/0.5ml, vaccinated in the age group 18-59.

intervention.intervention_name: Two doses of pilot scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine at the schedule of day 0,14 in elderly
intervention.description: The antigen content of the pilot scale inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine was 600SU/0.5ml, vaccinated in the age group above 60.

overall_official.affiliation: Jiangsu Provincial Center for Disease Prevention and Control

facility.name: Dafeng District Center for Disease Prevention and Control
